keyword: how many calories in fried chicken wing
title: How Many Calories in a Fried Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in fried chicken wing, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fried Chicken Wing?
assumptions: Breaded, deep-fried chicken wing with skin, average size (~85 g total); no added sauce or dipping.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, breading type, frying oil, portion size, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One fried chicken wing has about 103 kcal, with 7 g protein and 7 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (no added oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in one fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: Approximately 103 kcal for a standard breaded, fried wing with skin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 7.1 g of protein per wing.

faqs.q: Are fried chicken wings high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g total fat per wing, mostly from skin and frying oil.

faqs.q: How does baking change calories in chicken wings?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by ~40 kcal per wing compared to deep-frying.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in fried chicken wings?
faqs.a: Breading and seasoning contribute to ~250 mg sodium per wing; varies by recipe.
